Package com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration

Class PropertiesFileLocator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.PropertiesFileLocator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object to be used to locate a resource.
    public class PropertiesFileLocator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class searches for a properties file in the root of the classpath of the deployed war or at the server user home directory.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_FILE_NAME
      Default name to search for if none is provided.
      private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER
      Logger for this class.

      Reference to servlet context where application is running.
      private java.lang.String mFileName
      Properties file name containing configuration.
      private T mSource
      Reference to an object where resources can be looked in its library jar or war file.

    • Method Detail

      • locate

        public java.util.Properties locate()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Locates properties configuration based on provided parameters. First properties are searched based on applicaiton context name, then on user home and finally within a war or jar file.
        Returns:
        properties configuration.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • locateResource

        private java.io.InputStream locateResource()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Internal method to search for configuration file and return its corresponding input stream.
        Returns:
        input stream corresponding to configuration file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
